Uses of Package
com.github.mrm1st3r.cards.game

  • Packages that use com.github.mrm1st3r.cards.game 
    Package Description
    com.github.mrm1st3r.cards.game
    Contains the actual game logic.
    com.github.mrm1st3r.cards.game.ui
    Contains the user interface for the actual game.
  • Classes in com.github.mrm1st3r.cards.game used by com.github.mrm1st3r.cards.game 
    Class and Description
    Card
    This class describes a playing card.
    CardColor
    All possible four game card colors.
    CardValue
    All possible game card values.
    Gameplay
    This abstract class describes the general functions of a card game.
    LocalPlayer
    This class describes a local player.
    Player
    This class describes a card player.
  • Classes in com.github.mrm1st3r.cards.game used by com.github.mrm1st3r.cards.game.ui 
    Class and Description
    LocalPlayer
    This class describes a local player.
    ThirtyOne
    This class describes the game rules and sequence for the game "Thirty-One".
